# Atlas Point

## Overview

| Field | Details |
|-------|---------|
| **Website** | [theatlaspoint.com](https://www.theatlaspoint.com/) |
| **Category** | Behavioral Insights / Behavioral Finance / Client Engagement Platform |
| **Description** | Atlas Point is a behavioral science and analytics platform that helps financial advisors gain insight into the money psychology of their clients through survey-style assessments and psychometrics workshops. The platform uses advanced behavioral science to identify unique ways clients think and feel about money, translating data into simple, actionable tools for advisors. Atlas Point was recognized as a 2023 Finovative Awards winner for Best Wealth Management Solution and named Top 10 to Watch in 2024 as an innovator to change the industry. |

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Name | Cost | Key Features |
|------|------|------|--------------|
| **Standard** | Atlas Point Edge | **$149/mo per advisor** | Unlimited surveys, meeting prep, client profiles, CRM integrations, learning journeys |
| **Enterprise** | Enterprise Solutions | **Contact for pricing** | Firm-wide deployment, analytics, widgets, API access, coaching |

**Notes on Pricing:**
- **Atlas Point Edge:** $149/month per advisor (standard tier)
- **Free Trial:** Available for Atlas Point Edge
- **Enterprise Pricing:** Custom quotes for firm-wide solutions
- **Includes:** Unlimited prospecting and client engagement surveys, meeting prep tools, client profiles, CRM integrations, learning journeys with CE credits
- **Target Market:** Individual advisors, RIAs, broker-dealers, enterprise firms

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Behavioral Surveys** - 12+ types of science-backed surveys including Financial Virtues™, FinSight™, Pulse Checks, Uncertainty Mindset™
- **Client Profiles** - Unique household profiles and behavioral maps
- **Meeting Prep Tools** - Client-ready materials, insights, and recommended actions
- **FP Support & Learning** - Personalized education journey with 300+ resources
- **CRM Integrations** - Seamless workflow with existing CRM systems

### Advanced Features
- **Prospecting Surveys** - Discover prospect's financial strengths and biases
- **Ongoing Engagement** - Additional surveys and client-facing materials
- **Actionable Insights** - Behavioral insights with clear recommended actions
- **Recommendations Engine** - AI-powered personalized journey for each advisor
- **Courses (CE) on Demand** - Self-paced courses designed for financial professionals

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **WealthWiser™** - Firm-wide behavioral analytics and insights
- **Analytic Products** - Enterprise intelligence and data analytics
- **Behavioral Widgets** - Embeddable widgets for digital experiences
- **Lead Matching** - Behavioral-based lead matching system
- **BI Dashboard** - Business intelligence dashboard for tracking results
- **API Access** - Open APIs and embed options
- **BAC Certification** - Behavioral coaching certification for coaches

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### Atlas Point Coaching
**What it does:** Expert coaching support for financial professionals aligned with their unique business needs

**Key Features:**
- Personalized coaching sessions
- Growth metrics tracking
- BAC (Behavioral Advisor Certification) for coaches
- Unique financial professional journeys
- Sustainable growth support

**Pricing:** Contact for coaching packages

**Use Cases:**
- Advisors seeking personalized growth support
- Firms wanting to develop internal coaching capabilities
- Practices requiring behavioral certification

### Enterprise Intelligence
**What it does:** Tailored analytic engagements delivering in-depth insights into enterprise client bases

**Key Features:**
- Firm-wide behavioral analytics
- Segmentation strategy support
- Client and advisor behavioral data
- Growth agenda acceleration
- Informed decision-making tools

**Pricing:** Contact for enterprise pricing

**Use Cases:**
- Enterprise firms seeking firm-wide behavioral insights
- Marketing teams needing segmentation data
- Technology teams wanting API/widgets

---

## Integration Overview

**Total Integrations:** Multiple CRM and platform integrations

**Integration Types:**
- Native integrations (direct API connections)
- CRM synchronization
- Data export capabilities
- Widget embed options

**Key Integration Categories:**
- CRM Systems
- Portfolio Management Platforms
- Enterprise Systems

### Key Integrations

#### 1. Redtail CRM Integration
**Type:** Native integration (bi-directional)  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Import client specific tags and notes related to behavioral biases and personas from Atlas Point into Redtail  
**Data Synced:** Behavioral biases, personas, client tags, survey results  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (pre-configured integration)  
**Limitations:** Requires Redtail CRM subscription  
**Documentation:** Available through Atlas Point and Redtail

#### 2. Wealthbox CRM Integration
**Type:** Native integration (bi-directional)  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Connects personas and behavioral biases uncovered with Atlas Point's Financial Virtues™ survey to existing Wealthbox contacts  
**Data Synced:** Behavioral personas, biases, survey data, client insights  
**Setup Complexity:** Easy (pre-configured integration)  
**Limitations:** Requires Wealthbox subscription  
**Documentation:** [Wealthbox Atlas Point Integration](https://www.wealthbox.com/atlas-point-integrates-with-wealthbox-to-make-behavioral-finance-easy/)

#### 3. Black Diamond Integration
**Type:** Third-party integration  
**Direction:** One-way (data export)  
**What it does:** Integrates with Black Diamond Wealth Platform for enhanced client insights  
**Data Synced:** Behavioral data, client profiles, insights  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires Black Diamond subscription)  
**Limitations:** Requires Black Diamond platform  
**Documentation:** Available through Black Diamond

#### 4. Open API Integration
**Type:** REST API  
**Direction:** Bi-directional  
**What it does:** Custom integrations with proprietary systems and enterprise platforms  
**Data Synced:** Full behavioral data access based on permissions  
**Setup Complexity:** Hard (requires development resources)  
**Limitations:** Enterprise tier required  
**Documentation:** Available through enterprise sales

#### 5. Widget Embed Options
**Type:** Embed technology  
**Direction:** One-way (widget display)  
**What it does:** Embeddable behavioral widgets for digital experiences  
**Data Synced:** Behavioral insights, survey results, client data  
**Setup Complexity:** Medium (requires technical implementation)  
**Limitations:** Enterprise tier required  
**Documentation:** Available through enterprise sales

---

## Integration Types Available

- **Native integrations:** Redtail CRM, Wealthbox
- **API:** Open API for custom integrations (Enterprise)
- **Third-party:** Black Diamond, other platforms
- **Embed:** Widget options for digital experiences (Enterprise)

---

## Integration Categories

- **CRM Systems:** Redtail, Wealthbox
- **Portfolio Management:** Black Diamond
- **Enterprise Systems:** Open API, widgets
- **Custom Integrations:** API access for proprietary systems

---

## API & Developer Info

**API Availability:** Yes (Enterprise tier)

**Developer Portal:** Available through enterprise sales

**Authentication Methods:**
- API keys for custom integrations
- OAuth 2.0 for third-party apps
- SSO (SAML) for platform access

**Rate Limits:** Not publicly disclosed (contact for enterprise limits)

**API Documentation:** Available upon enterprise agreement

**Webhook Support:** Yes for real-time notifications

**API Cost:** Included in enterprise pricing

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros (5+ items)
1. **Science-Backed Surveys** - 12+ behavioral surveys based on actual behavioral science
2. **CRM Integrations** - Native integrations with Redtail and Wealthbox
3. **Affordable Pricing** - $149/mo per advisor is competitive
4. **Award-Winning** - 2023 Finovative Awards winner, Top 10 to Watch 2024
5. **Client Engagement** - Comprehensive tools for prospecting and ongoing engagement
6. **FP Support** - Personalized learning journeys with CE credits
7. **Actionable Insights** - Clear recommended actions based on behavioral data
8. **Enterprise Options** - Scalable from individual advisors to enterprise firms

### Cons (4+ items)
1. **Limited Integrations** - Only Redtail, Wealthbox, BlackDiamond documented
2. **Enterprise Features Limited** - Full API and widgets require enterprise tier
3. **Behavioral Focus Only** - Narrow focus on behavioral insights, not full planning
4. **Newer Platform** - Founded 2022, less established than competitors
5. **Pricing Transparency** - Enterprise pricing requires sales contact

### Alternatives
- **Andes Risk:** Behavioral finance and risk assessment
- **Asset-Map:** Financial visualization and mapping
- **Financial Feedback:** Behavioral finance tools
- **Riskalyze:** Risk tolerance assessment
- **NaviPlan:** Comprehensive planning with behavioral elements

### Use Cases

**Ideal For:**
- Advisors seeking to differentiate through behavioral insights
- Practices wanting to accelerate client relationships
- Firms needing client engagement and prospecting tools
- Advisors requiring personalized meeting preparation
- Practices wanting science-backed behavioral assessments
- Firms seeking organic growth solutions

**Not Ideal For:**
- Advisors seeking comprehensive financial planning (separate tool needed)
- Firms requiring extensive third-party integrations
- Practices not focused on behavioral finance
- Advisors wanting standalone CRM (requires integration)
- Firms needing long-established platforms

### Key Differentiators

1. **Behavioral Science Focus** - Founded by PhDs and data scientists combining Character Science, Behavioral Science, and Data Science
2. **Award-Winning Platform** - 2023 Finovative Awards winner, recognized as industry innovator
3. **Affordable Individual Pricing** - $149/mo per advisor makes it accessible
4. **CRM Native Integrations** - Pre-built integrations with Redtail and Wealthbox
5. **Client-Ready Materials** - Templated blogs, seminars, email starters included
6. **FP Learning Journeys** - Personalized education with CE credits

## Research Methodology Notes

**Sources Accessed:**
- Official Atlas Point website (theatlaspoint.com)
- Wealthbox integration documentation
- Business Wire press release
- Yahoo Finance news coverage
- Finantrix industry listing
- Crunchbase company profile
- LinkedIn company page

**Limitations Encountered:**
- Enterprise pricing not publicly disclosed
- API documentation requires enterprise agreement
- Limited public information on full integration capabilities
- Relatively new company (founded 2022), limited long-term track record

**Recommended Next Steps:**
1. Request enterprise pricing and API documentation from Atlas Point sales
2. Conduct free trial to assess survey quality and insights
3. Evaluate integration with existing CRM (Redtail or Wealthbox)
4. Review behavioral science methodology and validation
5. Assess ROI based on client engagement and asset consolidation
